title: Child Abduction from Theme Park Thwarted by Shoes
subtitle: Urban legend holds that an attempted abduction of a child from a mall or amusement park was thwarted because the kidnappers neglected to change the child's shoes.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: An attempted abduction of a child from a mall or amusement park was thwarted because the kidnappers forgot to change the child's shoes.
